page.title: 19 GOING INTO THE SECOND YEAR
page.content: When you first come to The Plume school you are put into a mixed ability form and you are taught together for all subjects. Then at the end of the Christmas term you are set for French - there is a top set,two parallel sets and one bottom set. If you are in the top set for French you can choose to take a second language in the second year. German and Spanish are offered in alternate years. In my year we were offered Spanish but the present First Years will be taking German. There are three "populations" in each year and 4 classes in each population e.g.2B1;2K1;2S1;2W1. At the end of the first year you are also set for Maths and Science. There is one top set and three parallel sets There is no setting in some subjects e.g. English. By Melanie Davis 2B3.
